short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist replacement for Chrome's default new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal replacement for the chrome new tab page that provides a simple persistent note system.

Try clicking the left side of the screen!

Clock style and light mode are available in the settings.

Hit 'n' to jump to the note input.
